en: These men dove to the Edmund Fitzgerald shipwreck decades ago. They share their stories.. Terrence Tysall set a record scuba diving to the Edmund Fitzgerald. Ric Mixter dove in a submersible, finding a missing body. Here are their stories.

title: Retiree’s close call with potential ‘disaster chasers’ prompts warning
description: When three men turned up on Geoff Wilson's doorstep offering to check his roof for damage he took them up on it. But a requirement that the repairs must be done by a builder of their choice put him on alert.
content:
The hailstorm that pummelled Geoff Wilson's Ipswich home last month was the worst he can recall in the almost 50 years he has lived there.
So, when three men turned up on his doorstep offering to ch… [+3718 chars]
de: Der enge Kontakt eines Rentners mit potenziellen „Katastrophenjägern“ löst eine Warnung aus. Als drei Männer vor Geoff Wilsons Haustür auftauchten und anboten, sein Dach auf Schäden zu überprüfen, nahm er sie darauf an. Doch die Forderung, dass die Reparaturen von einem Bauunternehmen seiner Wahl durchgeführt werden müssen, versetzte ihn in Alarmbereitschaft.
en: Retiree’s close call with potential ‘disaster chasers’ prompts warning. When three men turned up on Geoff Wilson's doorstep offering to check his roof for damage he took them up on it. But a requirement that the repairs must be done by a builder of their choice put him on alert.
la: Arctum vocationis retiree cum potentiale "clausores caesores" admonitionem suggerit. Cum tres viri in limen in Geoff Wilson oblationem verterent ut tectum suum ob damnum reprimeret, eas in eo suscepit. Necessitas autem reparationum faciendarum ab architecto suo ad electionem faciendam intendit eum.

Dutzende Hochzeitsgäste eilten herbei, um Kinder unter Tischen zu schützen und hielten die Wände eines Empfangssaals hoch, während am Wochenende im Banana Shire in Queensland ein heftiger Sturm tobte.
en: Wedding guests shelter under tables as storm tears roof from historic hall in central Queensland. Dozens of wedding guests rushed to shelter children under tables and hold up the walls of a reception hall during an intense storm in Queensland's Banana Shire over the weekend.

title: Over 20 Million In Tennessee, Ohio Valleys Face Threat Of Severe Weather As Cold Front Moves In
